remarks: An open neighborhood of a cluster point of a filter intersects any element of that filter.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Apr-2015.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 8-Aug-2015.)
statement: fclsopni $p |- ( ( A e. ( J fClus F ) /\ ( U e. J /\ A e. U /\ S e. F ) ) -> ( U i^i S ) =/= (/) ) $.
